def_cn: (指代已经提及的人或物)那些
def_en: You use those to refer to people or things which have already been mentioned.

def_cn: 那些(尤用于指示或指向在时间、空间上离自己稍远的人或物)
def_en: You use those when you are referring to people or things that are a distance away from you in position or time, especially when you indicate or point to them.

def_cn: (用于提供更多的细节、信息)
def_en: You use those to refer to someone or something when you are going to give details or information about them.

def_cn: (用来对已经提及的事物作补充说明)
def_en: You use those to introduce more information about something already mentioned, instead of repeating the noun which refers to it.

def_cn: (用于认为谈话对象知道所谈事物或确认双方所想为相同的人或事物时)
def_en: You use those when you refer to things that you expect the person you are talking to to know about or when you are checking that you are both thinking of the same people or things.
